short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display random marketing quotes on new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Marketing Quotes is a lightweight and inspiring Chrome extension that displays random marketing quotes on your new tab page. Each time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with a thought-provoking quote from influential marketing experts, such as Seth Godin, Simon Sinek, and Joe Chernov. Built with üçú by the Ramen Club community.
